overview: Rachel is a beautiful yet timid housewife in a troubled marriage desperately looking for an escape. When Rachel's husband leaves her she suddenly finds herself alone. Desperate for love and attention she becomes drawn to an eccentric artist who opens his home and heart to her. But as quickly as she falls for him, another man enters the picture. Confused and desperate she slowly realizes that you can't depend on others to save you, you have to save yourself.
title: Polarity
